name: Sniper Shoot :Killer WWR II
description:
Sniper Shoot :Killer WWR II is an action-type first-person shooter. The game is full of fighting, shooting and challenging.Complete one after another action, as you complete the mission, the difficulty of the game will gradually increase. Aim as much as possible, shoot, get more points. Realistic game details and 3D visual graphics and different game difficulty, bring you the perfect shooting fun. Join the real war action and become an anti-terror commandos until the last minute.
Features:
- real scene environment
- Realistic shooting effect
- Excellent music and sound effects
- a variety of powerful weapons
- Difficult mission
- Intelligent AI, to make the game more challenging
